mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from JX_STUDENTS
order by ${orderByClause}

distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from JX_STUDENTS
order by ${orderByClause}

update JX_STUDENTS
XH = #{record.xh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{record.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELNUMBER = #{record.telnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NATIONAL = #{record.national,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDCARD = #{record.idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY = #{record.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{record.birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARRIAGESTATE = #{record.marriagestate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOVERNMENT = #{record.government,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INPARTYTIME = to_date(#{record.inpartytime,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
INGANGTIME = to_date(#{record.ingangtime,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
FAMILYNAME = #{record.familyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAMILYREAT = #{record.familyreat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

FAMILYADDRESS = #{record.familyaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUYEAR = #{record.stuyear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

EMIAL = #{record.emial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHOOLNUM = #{record.schoolnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FYZJE = #{record.fyzje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OPENID = #{record.openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERTYPE = #{record.pertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZHIWEITYPE = #{record.zhiweitype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FROMUNIT = #{record.fromunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISGRADUATE = #{record.isgraduate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRADUATESCHOOL = #{record.graduateschool,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRADUATETIME = to_date(#{record.graduatetime,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
COLLEGEID = #{record.collegeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLLEGENAME = #{record.collegename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLASSID = #{record.classid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROFESSIONALCLASS = #{record.professionalclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHOOLTEACHERID = #{record.schoolteacherid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHOOLTEACHERNAME = #{record.schoolteachername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHOOLTEACHERTEL = #{record.schoolteachertel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SFGP = #{record.sfgp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEACHERID = #{record.teacherid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TEACHRENAME = #{record.teachrename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CULTIVATETYPE = #{record.cultivatetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROFESSIONAL = #{record.professional,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROFESSIONALGUID = #{record.professionalguid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XUELI = #{record.xueli,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDYSTARTTIME = to_date(#{record.studystarttime,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
STUDYENDTIME = to_date(#{record.studyendtime,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
MONTH = #{record.month,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMAGEPATH = #{record.imagepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECKCONTENT = #{record.checkcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHZT = #{record.shzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHRID = #{record.shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHSJ = to_date(#{record.shsj,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
JFBJ = #{record.jfbj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JFSJ = to_date(#{record.jfsj,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
ZT = #{record.zt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = to_date(#{record.createtime,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
UPDATETIME = to_date(#{record.updatetime,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
SIGNMARKING = #{record.signmarking,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GLBM = #{record.glbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK1 = #{record.remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK2 = #{record.remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK3 = #{record.remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK4 = #{record.remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK5 = #{record.remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SXZMBJ = #{record.sxzmbj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

JDBJ = #{record.jdbj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ASSUREEMPNAME = #{record.assureempname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TZYY = #{record.tzyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TZRQ = to_date(#{record.tzrq,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
